cause.description:
I am an American. As such, I have the right to drink myself to death, gamble away every cent I own, or smoke until my lungs are black.
This comes from someone who has never drank a drop in his life, gambled a penny or smoked a cigarette. But the rights of Americans to choose, and to make their own decisions in life, is invluable, and a rare commodity in the days of large government interference in the lives of many.
1. Pro Choice in abortion
2. Legalized marijuana, alcohol, and tobacco products
cause.mission: Maintain the liberties of our fellow Americans.
cause.name: Freedom
